titleStmt.title: Politick discourses written in Italian by Paolo Paruta ... ; whereunto is added a short soliloquy in which the author briefly examines the whole course of his life ; rendred into English by the Right Honorable Henry, Earl of Monmouth.
Discorsi politici. English
titleStmt.author: Paruta, Paolo, 1540-1598.
Monmouth, Henry Carey, Earl of, 1596-1661.

notesStmt.note: Pages [17] and [18] are repeated three times.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
